title: Baked Apple Pork Chops
ingredients: ['4 tomatoes', '4 apples, peeled, cored and sliced', 'sugar', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'oil or lard for the ovenproof dish', '4 onions, sliced thinly', '8 pork chops (each about 150g)', 'flour for dusting', '6 tablespoons white wine']
